attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: smoking must be free there are laws passive smoking helps education open air smoking must always be allowed so must smoking in groups the advantages of smoking much outweigh the disadvantages tobbacco is the sacred weed of the red indians the greatest civilisation smoking also cures septic pneumonia and bronchitis i am qualified laws contrdict no-one can be covicted for smoking  society is already going mad without it , smoking fuels the intelligence all children smoke do not let criminals get their way and restrct our freedom that has happened enough if u want to return to a golden age allow smoking most are too young to remember smoking kills ans other warnings on ciggarrette packets are scaremongering and a crime people have been killed by doctors and their notes been falsified with the evidence against much less than the evidence forsign to repeal and bring back sense

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
